Description: Warm bass, present vocals, and clear highs (e.g., guitar strings).
Emphasizes dynamic range. Slight boosts for clarity and "air."
Focuses on mid-range for vocals and guitar, with solid bass.
Strong "four-on-the-floor" bass kick and shimmery cymbals.
Heavily boosted bass, slightly scooped mids, and clear percussion.
Balances complex instrumentation, with boosts for clarity and cymbals.
The classic "scooped mid" sound for heavy guitars and drums.
Boosted lows and highs for an exciting "smiley face" curve.
Bass-heavy groove, with mids often cut to make space for it.
Powerful bass and drums, and crisp guitar/cymbal highs.
